post.body: That writing is old and I have mixed feelings about it looking like a label.
Simply delighting in your reply.
Oh, no, that was not a negative comment. Just true. And, it was totally cool to ask about it. :-)
So think that twitter prayers work!
Being that I try not to get into labels, no, but I started out with it as my specialty in doctors with ADD 14 yrs ago.
Got it. Thank you!
Seriously spooky. Shakin' it off. Shakin' it off.
Was hoping you would! Coolness. I have an 8 coach who is very good with patterns, like you seem to be.
Ah, kind of sad. Did she give away her password? Is that how it happened?
Yes! This is like chiaroscuro agent. The depth and definition created by light on matter. Angels singing "ahhh."
Sensitive enough to ask. And, sensitive enough to admit where you don't think you are sensitive.
Or, you can realize just how much you actually do! How much longer before you can lift anything?
I totally get this, I'm post op, too & can't lift over 5 lbs for 1 month. Well, that rules out a lot!
Yes, itz very positive, recognizing the light in every soul.
Now that is a cool perspective. Do you know your Enneagram type?
She probably just had her account hacked, unfortunately.
What are you finding most fascinating about how people are using twitter?
Now we are talking. I used to burn out streep lamps when I walked by until I learned how to "ground" my energy.
You know when that whale pops up on the screen it does feel like a rocking boat when you click back & twitter is afloat.
Had my first feeling of "needing to speak" to someone on twitter to clarify something, so I didn't hurt feelings.
